items.question: What quality can I expect from the headshot?
items.answer: Our generator produces high-resolution headshots that are vibrant and professional. You can choose between standard quality for quick downloads or premium options for added depth and detail.

items.question: Can I customize my headshot style?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our tool allows you to select from various styles and adjust backgrounds, lighting, and more to fit your needs.

items.question: What types of images work best for the headshot generator?
items.answer: Clear, well-lit images work best. We recommend using photos with good resolution, ideally above 512x512 pixels, for optimal results.

items.question: How do I use the headshot for online profiles?
items.answer: Once your headshot is generated, you can download it and easily upload it to your desired platform, including LinkedIn, company websites, and more.

items.question: Is there a cost for generating headshots?
items.answer: We operate on a flexible pay-as-you-go model with no subscriptions. You pay only for the headshots you create, making it accessible for everyone.

items.question: How long does it take to generate a headshot?
items.answer: Typically, headshot generation takes 1-2 minutes. You can create multiple headshots in this timeframe if needed.

items.question: What if I need help or support?
items.answer: We provide extensive resources including tutorials, best practices, and customer support via chat and email for all your inquiries.

items.question: Do I own the rights to the generated headshots?
items.answer: Yes! You have full commercial rights to use your headshots freely across all platforms without additional fees.

items.question: Can I edit the generated headshots afterward?
items.answer: Yes! You can download your headshot and use external tools for additional editing, if desired.

items.question: What are the best use cases for the AI headshot generator?
items.answer: This technology is perfect for creating professional images for LinkedIn, corporate websites, social media, and any context where first impressions matter.
